1.name: Portable Handheld Turbo Fan
1.description: Stay cool anywhere with this USB rechargeable handheld fan. Powerful yet quiet motor, lightweight, foldable, and perfect for travel, workouts, and daily use.

2.name: Elegant Small Pearl Lamp
2.description: Elegant small pearl lamp available in two colors. Perfect for table décor, events, or ambient home lighting. Modern and stylish design with soft glow.

3.name: Air Purifier for Home Allergies Pets Hair
3.description: Covers up to 1095 ft², features a HEPA-grade filter and quiet sleep mode. Ideal for bedrooms and large spaces. 141CFM CADR, 56W motor, and compact design.

4.name: LED Desk Lamp for Home Office
4.description: 9.5W 750LM metal lamp with touch controls. Eye-friendly lighting perfect for office, study, or bedside. Sleek and modern for productivity and comfort.

5.name: Automatic Peeler for Kitchen
5.description: One-touch electric peeler for quick and mess-free fruit and vegetable peeling. Adjustable arm fits various sizes. Ideal for home cooks and seniors.

6.name: Valentine's Day Heart-Shaped 3D Moon Photo Viewer
6.description: Custom romantic gift with hidden photo projection. Heart-shaped moon design perfect for Valentine’s, anniversaries, or special moments.
